query.statement: SELECT A.TERM_MENU_CD -- 추천식단관리_메인 ,A.MENU_DATE AS FDAY ,A.MEAL AS SGBN ,(SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0023' AND CODE = A.MEAL) SGBN_NM ,A.CORNER CGBN_CD ,(SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0022' AND CODE = A.CORNER) CGBN ,'' CGBN_NM ,C.PHF ,'' DUP_STA ,'' DUP_COLOR ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MENU_DATE, MEAL, CORNER ORDER BY MEAL, CORNER, RECIPE_SEQ, CUISINE_TYPE ASC) SSEQ ,B.RECIPE_CD AS SD_CD ,C.RECIPE_NAME AS SD_NM ,SUM(ROUND( D.NEED_QTY * (NVL(E.MARGIN_PRICE,0) / F.KG_CONVERT_RATE / 1000) ) ) SD_WON ,C.MAIN_ITEM_CODE1 ,C.CUISINE_TYPE ,F.ORIGIN_NAT ,A.MENU_TYPE ,(SELECT SUM(ROUND((EE.CAL * (BB.NEED_QTY*((100-EE.DISUSE_RATE)/100)) / 100),2)) FROM FMM_TERM_MENU_MST M , FMM_TERM_MENU_RECIPE AA, FMM_TERM_MENU_RECIPE_ITEM BB , FSI_ITEM_NUT EE WHERE M.TERM_MENU_CD = AA.TERM_MENU_CD AND M.TERM_MENU_CD = BB.TERM_MENU_CD AND AA.RECIPE_CD = BB.RECIPE_CD AND BB.ITEM_CODE = EE.ITEM_CODE AND M.TERM_MENU_CD = A.TERM_MENU_CD) CAL FROM FMM_TERM_MENU_MST A ,FMM_TERM_MENU_RECIPE B ,FMR_STD_RECIPE_MST C --,FMR_STD_RECIPE_ITEM D ,FMM_TERM_MENU_RECIPE_ITEM D ,FMI_STD_PRICE E ,( SELECT ITEM_CODE, KG_CONVERT_RATE, ORIGIN_NAT FROM HLDC_PO_ITEM_MST WHERE ITEM_CLASS1 = 'F' ) F WHERE A.TERM_MENU_CD = B.TERM_MENU_CD AND A.TERM_MENU_CD = D.TERM_MENU_CD AND B.RECIPE_CD = C.RECIPE_CD AND C.RECIPE_CD = D.RECIPE_CD AND D.ITEM_CODE = E.ITEM_CODE(+) AND D.ITEM_CODE = F.ITEM_CODE AND A.MENU_DATE BETWEEN #MENU_SDATE# AND #MENU_EDATE# AND A.MENU_CLASS = #MENU_CLASS# -- 기간식단분류 AND A.COST_TYPE = #COST_TYPE# -- 원가유형 AND A.MENU_TYPE = #MENU_TYPE# -- 식단유형 AND A.MEAL = #MEAL# -- 끼니 GROUP BY A.TERM_MENU_CD ,A.MENU_DATE ,B.RECIPE_SEQ ,C.CUISINE_TYPE ,A.MEAL ,A.CORNER ,B.RECIPE_CD ,C.RECIPE_NAME ,C.PHF ,C.MAIN_ITEM_CODE1 ,F.ORIGIN_NAT ,A.MENU_TYPE ORDER BY FDAY, SGBN, CGBN_CD, SSEQ
